thread.title: Lady Gaga To Play Detroit’s Little Caesars Arena
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga To Play Detroit’s Little Caesars Arena

author: News – CBS Detroit
title: Lady Gaga To Play Detroit’s Little Caesars Arena
text:
Lady Gaga To Play Detroit’s Little Caesars Arena February 6, 2017 8:25 AM Filed Under: lady gaga , Super Bowl Lady Gaga sings the National Anthem at Super Bowl 50 at Levi\'s Stadium on February 7, 2016 in Santa Clara, California. (Photo by Matt Cowan/Getty Images) 
DETROIT (WWJ) After a much-lauded Super Bowl performance on Sunday, Lady Gaga announced a new tour that includes a Nov. 7 stop at Detroit’s Little Caesars Arena. 
Tickets for the Detroit date will go on sale Feb. 20. Citi credit card holders can buy pre-sale tickets from 9 a.m. Feb. 15 to 5 p.m. Feb. 19. 
For hungry little monsters, this will be Gaga’s first visit to Detroit since a 2014 show at Joe Louis Arena.
